body.p: Henderson County, Kentucky, planter. Pennsylvania native. Married to Judith Towles Beatty on May 19, 1857. Father of Fanney D. Beatey. Step-father of Nannie Toweles, Mattie Towles, Mattie Towles, Thomas Towles, and Bettier Towles. Owned twenty-three enslaved persons in 1860.
